Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed near 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing near 35th/Archer due to a track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing near 35th/Archer due to a track condition. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
